SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT count(*) AS Mispar_Tashlumim FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT left(t.DATE_MEKORI, 6) AS DateMekoryMonth FROM A_TASHLUMIM t WHERE t.NUMERATOR_TIK = :1 AND t.SUG_TASHLUM = 0 AND t.DATE_METUCHNAN >= ':2' AND t.STATUS_TASHLUM<=2 :3 ) AS tash

ExpSyntax.val: IF({0,2}, 'AND t.SUM_TASHLUM_SHACH=0 and not exists (select 1 from A_TASHLUMIM t1 where t1.NUMERATOR_TIK=t.NUMERATOR_TIK and left (t1.DATE_MEKORI,6)=left (t.DATE_MEKORI,6) and t1.SUM_TASHLUM_SHACH<>0)' ,'AND not exists (select 1 from A_TASHLUMIM t1 where t1.NUMERATOR_TIK=t.NUMERATOR_TIK and left (t1.DATE_MEKORI,6)=left (t.DATE_MEKORI,6) and t1.SUM_TASHLUM_SHACH<>0 and t1.STATUS_TASHLUM>2)')

Column.name: קיים תשלום ע. מדינה קרן שנפרע
